'''''Beyond Bree'' July 1981''' is the July edition of the [[Beyond Bree]] journal published by the [[Tolkien Special Interest Group of American Mensa]].

==Contents==
* "The Silmarillion Map" by N. Martsch
* Review of film Knights of the Round Table
* Short Tolkien bibliography
* Middle-earth Atlasses
